Ingredients.1: 1 (1.25 ounce) package dry taco seasoning mix

Ingredients.3: 1 (14 ounce) package prepared pizza dough, or as needed

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).

Directions.2: Sprinkle taco seasoning on ground beef. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain and discard grease.

Directions.3: Divide pizza dough in half and flatten each half into a thin crust over a nonstick baking sheet.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven for 3 minutes. Remove but leave oven on.

Directions.5: Mix pizza sauce, cumin, and salt together in a bowl. Spread 1/2 of the mixture over each pizza crust. Sprinkle beef and Cheddar cheese evenly on top.

Directions.6: Bake until crusts are crunchy and cheese is melted, 10 to 12 minutes.
